original_text: And had rained down manna upon them to eat, and had given them of the corn of heaven.
korean_text: 그들에게 만나를 비 같이 내려 먹이시며 하늘 양식을 그들에게 주셨나니

sentences.original_text: And had rained down manna upon them to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 먹기 위해 만나를 그들에게 내리셨고

sentences.original_text: and had given them of the corn of heaven
